text: Benjamin William Mkapa (November 12, 1938 - July 24, 2020) was a Tanzanian politician. He was the third President of Tanzania, in office from 1995 to 2005."His Excellency Benjamin William Mkapa" , Board of Trustees, AKU University, retrieved 19-10-2009 He was also Chairman of the Revolutionary State Political Party (Chama Cha Mapinduzi, CCM). Mkapa died on July 24, 2020 in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania at the age of 81.Tanzania's former President Benjamin William Mkapa has died ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Presidents of Tanzania Category:Makerere University alumni Category:Tanzanian Roman Catholics
title: Benjamin Mkapa
